MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline is still ongoing. This is due to on site delays and we now expect power to be back on by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:35pm on Monday 19th October 2020
